description: Returns and edits the Encryption at Rest using Customer Key Management configuration.

AwsKms.description: Specifies AWS KMS configuration details and whether Encryption at Rest is enabled for an Atlas project.

RoleID.description: ID of an AWS IAM role authorized to manage an AWS customer master key.

CustomerMasterKeyID.description: The AWS customer master key used to encrypt and decrypt the MongoDB master keys.

Enabled.description: Specifies whether Encryption at Rest is enabled for an Atlas project. To disable Encryption at Rest, pass only this parameter with a value of false. When you disable Encryption at Rest, Atlas also removes the configuration details.

Region.description: The AWS region in which the AWS customer master key exists.

Profile.description: The profile is defined in AWS Secret manager. See [Secret Manager Profile setup](../../../examples/profile-secret.yaml).

ProjectId.description: Unique identifier of the Atlas project to which the user belongs.
